t.duetime,
t.coinnum FROM ( (SELECT '包裹' AS goodstype, packno AS goodsno, ownid AS ownid, '-1' AS requeststatus, cutstatus AS goodsstatus, '' AS sendtype, createtime AS handlingtime,
'' duetime,
'' paydiffertime, '' payinfo, '' coinnum FROM logistics_pack WHERE cutstatus = '0' AND receivestatus = '0'
AND ownid = '--'
) UNION ALL (SELECT '申请单' AS goodstype, rr.requestcode AS goodsno, rr.ownid AS ownid, rr.requeststatus AS requeststatus, rr.internalstates AS goodsstatus, rr.sendtype AS sendtype, rr.requesttime AS handlingtime,
rr.duetime AS duetime,
